verbose_text: The induction of ABCA1 by PPE was mediated through the activation of the PPARgamma-LXRalpha-responsive cellular signaling pathway, thus transferring effluxed cholesterol onto lipid-poor apolipoproteins, thus promoting the formation of HDL particles.
evidence: ABCA1 by PPE was mediated through the activation of the PPARgamma-LXRalpha-responsive cellular signaling pathway, thus transferring effluxed cholesterol
